name: Debtors Report
query:
SELECT	si.cost_center AS "Cost Center:Data:50",
		si.customer	AS "Customer:Data:150",
		si.lease_item AS "Lease Item:Data:100",
		si.due_date AS "Due Date:Date:100",
		if (si.currency = si.party_account_currency, si.outstanding_amount, si.outstanding_amount/si.conversion_rate) AS "Outstanding:Link/Currency:100"
FROM	`tabSales Invoice` si
WHERE si.status IN ("Sumitted", "Unpaid", "Overdue")
